Metadata.Author: Orion Lawlor <lawlor@alaska.edu>
Metadata.Coordinates: Origin is in the exact center of the moon; Z axis runs through the moon's rotational axis (toward Mars' north pole); X axis points toward Mars (Phobos lat/lon 0,0); Y axis points orbital retrograde.
Metadata.Sources: Data for the moons are from https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/planetary/factsheet/marsfact.html
